FrameLayout:
<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto">
<com.roughike.bottombar.BottomBar android:id="@+id/bottomBar" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="60dp" android:layout_alignParentBottom="true" app:bb_tabXmlResource="@xml/bottombar_tabs" />
<FrameLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:padding="16dp">
</FrameLayout>
</RelativeLayout>
